name: Jacques Derrida
main_interests: Philosophy of language· Literary theory· Ethics· Ontology
notable_ideas: Deconstruction· Différance· Phallogocentrism· Metaphysics of presence
influenced: Paul de Man· Bernard Stiegler· Jean-Luc Nancy· Philippe Lacoue-Labarthe· Ernesto Laclau· Judith Butler· Louis Althusser· Peter Eisenman· Edward Said· Homi K. Bhabha· Gayatri Chakravorty Spivak· John Caputo· Simon Critchley· Mario Kopic· Peter Sloterdijk· Avital Ronell· Catherine Malabou
